Html:
This is a really exciting project and implements functionality that I really need, but my requirement is for a lightweight C# language parser.  Particularly I need to be able to use the "hook" syntax:  (boolean expression) ? (true result) : (false result) ;

Is there any way to replace the existing language parser with one that would recognize C/C# syntax?

Have you checked out the Irony project at http://www.codeplex.com/irony?  This project has a scanner and an LALR(1) parser and one of the example grammars is for C#. Unfortunately, I haven't seen too much from the FLEE project since the author's last update.  I hope the author gets a second wind because I think it was a lot of potential.
